step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move overhead.
As you stretch your arms overhead, ensure your fingers are spread wide.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Excellent! Stretch your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
You're doing well. Focus on maintaining open fingers and a relaxed posture throughout the movement.
Second rep starting strong. Remember to keep your arms relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move overhead.
As you stretch your arms overhead, ensure your fingers are spread wide.
Nicely done making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Good work stretching your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing.
You're finishing strong! Keep focusing on open fingers and a relaxed posture throughout the movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and squeeze your shoulder blades together when making a fist. Continue to focus on your breathing, inhaling as you tighten and exhaling as you relax.
